fact: Hell has seven gates.
It is fueled by men and stones.
Its fire is seventy times hotter than worldly fire.
It will be brought on the Day of Judgment with seventy thousand chains, each pulled by seventy thousand angels.
Its keepers are stern angels called Zabaniyah.
The chief angel of Hell is Malik.
The disbelievers will cry to Malik to end their lives, but he will not respond for a thousand years.
The skin of the people will be burned and replaced repeatedly.
Their faces will be turned upside down in the Fire.
They will drink boiling water that tears their intestines.
They will eat from the tree of Zaqqum.
Zaqqum fruit will boil in their stomachs like scalding oil.
They will have garments of fire cut for them.
Boiling water will be poured over their heads melting what is inside their bellies.
They will be beaten with iron maces.
They will be dragged on their faces in the Fire.
They will be shackled and chained.
They will be surrounded by fire from above and below.
Their lips will be pulled back exposing their teeth in horror.
They will cry for death but it will not come.
They will neither live nor die in it.
Their punishment will never be lightened.
They will be in eternal regret and despair.
They will argue and curse each other.
The least punishment will feel like burning coals under the feet that make the brain boil.
The inhabitants will be huge in size to increase their suffering.
The molar tooth of a person in Hell will be the size of Mount Uhud.
Their seat in Hell will be like the distance between Makkah and Madinah.
The depth of Hell is so great that if a stone is thrown, it would fall for seventy years.
The fire consumes everything without leaving bones.
They will be blackened by smoke and fire.
The sound of Hell is a terrible roaring and blazing.
They will be bound together in chains of seventy cubits.
They will be thrown back every time they try to escape.
They will be humiliated and disgraced.
They will have no protector or intercessor.
Their cries will be muffled and unanswered.
They will be isolated and cut off from hope.
They will be made to taste different levels of punishment.
Their tongues will testify against them.
Their skins will testify against them.
The arrogant and tyrants will be gathered like ants and trampled.
Hypocrites will be in the lowest depths of Hell.
Disbelievers will remain there forever.
Some sinful Muslims may enter it temporarily then be removed by Allah's mercy.
Its breath once came out and caused extreme summer heat and winter cold on Earth.
It has different levels and degrees of punishment.
It will be closed over them with columns stretched.
Their screams will echo while they are in chains.
Hell is eternal for the disbelievers and never ends.
